Text: Allows building structures such as Platforms over plants.
Allows planting directly on roofs and platforms without soil. These plants receive irrigation and contamination from the land below.
Prevents land contamination from being brought up. Enables planting trees or crops on platforms even if the land below is unsuitable.

Growth options: Set below default ×1 to decrease difficulty except for Output Multiplier. Examples: - Planting Time Multiplier ×0.5: Planting Oak 1 hours → 0.5 hours. - Growth Rate ×0.5: Potato grows in 5 days → 2.5 days. - Output Multiplier ×1.5: Carrot yields 3 → 4. - Harvest Time Multiplier ×0.5: Oak cutting 2 hours → 1 hour. - Demolishing Time Multiplier ×0.5: demolishing Pine 1.2 hours → 0.6 hours.
Multiplier for time taken to plant.
Multiplier for time taken to harvest/cut down.
Multiplier for time taken to demolish.
Tree options: Log providing plants that are planted by Foresters (e.g. Pine, Oak).
Crop options: All other plants that are planted by Farmers or Foresters (e.g. Carrot, Blueberry and Dandelion Bushes).
Product options: Products that grow on mature plants (e.g. Pine Resin, Blueberries).

Adjusts the chance for trees to reproduce each hour (default: 1–3% depending on type).
Default: ×1. ×0 disables reproduction. Example: ×2 makes a Pine with a base 3% chance reproduce at 6% chance.
